abstract: Fifteen years after her first visit, the native Angeleno still makes the trip to the Tucson Gem, Mineral & Fossil Showcase to collect treasures for her line.

headline.main: Jewelry Designer Irene Neuwirth Goes to the Gem Show

snippet: Fifteen years after her first visit, the native Angeleno still makes the trip to the Tucson Gem, Mineral & Fossil Showcase to collect treasures for her line.
